meanings.definition: A style of playing on stringed instruments involving short, bouncing bow strokes.
meanings.sent1: During the concert, the violinist showcased her impressive spiccato technique.
meanings.sent2: The orchestra performed a beautiful piece with spiccato passages.
meanings.sent3: The spiccato bow strokes made the violinist look like a bouncing ball on stage.
meanings.sent4: Her spiccato playing was like raindrops dancing on a windowpane.
meanings.sent5: The spiccato technique added a lively touch to the music.
